get.description: List of factors enabled for the Auth0 tenant and available for enrollment by this user.
get.summary: Get the status of all factors

get.description: Retrieve detailed list of authentication methods belonging to the authenticated user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Optional: Page index of the results to return. First page is 0. Default is 0.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Optional: Number of results per page. Default is 20.

parameters.name: include_totals
parameters.description: Optional: Return results inside an object that contains the total result count (true) or as a direct array of results (false, default).
